explains: v. （监禁、戒毒或病后通过培训和治疗）使恢复正常生活；恢复……的权利，恢复……的名誉；使（建筑物或地区）恢复原状，修复

sentences.en: Considerable efforts have been made to rehabilitate patients who have suffered in this way.
sentences.cn: 为使受这种苦的病人康复已经付出了相当大的努力。

sentences.en: Time, then, to rehabilitate the alchemists.
sentences.cn: 而现在时间会为炼金术士们正名。

sentences.en: Rehabilitate [the poor] at the hands of the king.
sentences.cn: 从国王手里为穷人昭雪。
